channel.title: [Crossbow model] Green bolt not shown when holding fire1
channel.description:
If you hold mouse1 and keep firing, the green bolt doesn't spawn in the crossbow before the projectile is shot. So it looks like Gordon is firing nothing but a projectile spawns.
Maybe add the green bolt a little bit before the reload animation for each shot finishes.
